components.description:
A person juggling between three and five colored balls. The person shown in this emoji wears a hat on most major platforms.

Early Twitter and Facebook designs previously displayed this emoji as a pair of disembodied hands juggling three colored balls.
components.title: Juggling

components.description:
Zero Width Joiner (ZWJ) is a Unicode character that joins two or more other characters together in sequence to create a new emoji.

Zero Width Joiner, pronounced "zwidge", is not an emoji and has no appearance by itself. This is an invisible character when used alone.

View Emoji ZWJ Sequences that use this character.
components.title: Zero Width Joiner

components.description: A circle shown with a diagonal arrow pointing out the top-right, used as a representation for men.
components.title: Male Sign

description: A man juggling between three and five colored balls. The person shown in this emoji wears a hat on most major platforms.
title: Man Juggling

bn:13674016v: To handle multiple tasks at once.

bn:00048524n: Juggling is a physical skill, performed by a juggler, involving the manipulation of objects for recreation, entertainment, art, or sport.
Moving of objects in an artful manner.
Throwing and catching several objects simultaneously
The art of moving objects, such as balls, clubs, beanbags, rings, etc. in an artful or artistic manner.

bn:00001533n: Sexual maturity is the age or stage when an organism can reproduce.
The age or stage when an organism can reproduce
A man is a male human.
An adult human member of the sex that begets young by fertilizing ova.
A human member of the masculine sex or gender.
An adult person who is male (as opposed to a woman)

apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the man juggling emoji presents a dynamic and skillful individual, captured in motion with Apple‚Äôs characteristic glossy 3D shading and smooth gradients. The figure is shown with a sense of energetic movement, with multiple colorful objects in the air, each rendered with a soft, rounded form. This emoji, with its vibrant and playful aesthetic on Apple‚Äôs platforms, effectively communicates multitasking, handling many tasks, or a sense of impressive dexterity.
